title: BaseAuditObject
description: Canonical base schema for all audit artifacts. Ensures traceability and version control.

schema_version.description: Semantic version of the schema used (e.g., 2.0.0).

analysis_id.description: Unique identifier for this specific analysis run.

prompt_hash.description: SHA-256 hash of the prompt used.

model_version.description: Identifier of the AI model used (e.g., gemini-1.5-pro-002).

policy_wordings_checksum.description: SHA-256 checksum of the policy wordings file.

_compatibility.frontend_rejection_condition: If schema_version major version > frontend supported version.
